import React,{Component} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' class Edit extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) } componentDidMount=()=>{ let id=this.props.match.params.id; console.log('http://localhost:300/todos/'+id) axios.get('http://localhost:300/todos/'+id) .then(response => {var dt=response.data.last_date;dt=new Date(dt); var dtt=dt.getDate();var mt=dt.getMonth()+1; var yr=dt.getFullYear(); var ld=dtt+'/'+mt+'/'+yr;this.setState({'task':response.data.task,'last_date':ld})}) .catch(error => {console.log(error)}) } render(){ return(

Edit Task



) } } export default Edit
